title: The Discovery
caption: A farmer finds a serpent frozen and helpless in the snow. Compassion moves him to gently lift the creature.
prompt: A serene winter landscape. A kind-faced farmer, bundled in warm clothing, gently cradles a shivering, snow-covered snake in his hands. Emphasize the contrast between the farmer's gentle expression and the serpent's vulnerable state. Soft, diffused lighting. Background: snow-covered field with bare trees.

title: Warming the Serpent
caption: He brings it home, warming it by the fire. He believed that kindness would be returned in kind.
prompt: A cozy interior scene. A farmer sits by a crackling fireplace, carefully holding the snake near the warmth. Details: Simple, rustic furnishings. The snake appears to be slowly thawing. Warm, inviting lighting with strong shadows from the fire.

title: The Serpent Awakens
caption: As the serpent revives, its true nature emerges. Gratitude is replaced by venomous intent.
prompt: Close-up of the snake. Its eyes, previously dull, now gleam with a cold, predatory light. Its head is raised, ready to strike. Focus on the stark contrast between the snake's coldness and the warmth of the surrounding environment. Background: blurred image of the farmer's hand.

title: The Ungrateful Bite
caption: Betrayal stings as the serpent bites the hand that saved it. This is the cruel irony of returning evil for good.
prompt: A slightly blurred image. The snake's fangs sink into the farmer's hand. A small trickle of blood is visible. The farmer's face is visible in the background, showing shock and disbelief. Use desaturated colors to emphasize the somber mood.

title: The Bitter Lesson
caption: The farmer recoils in pain, realizing his mistake. Sometimes, kindness is met with malice.
prompt: The farmer clutching his bitten hand, his face contorted in pain and regret. He looks down at the snake with a mixture of sorrow and understanding. Background: the warm glow of the fireplace fades slightly. Focus on the farmer's emotional expression.

title: The Serpent's Demise
caption: Though he has returned with evil for good, now he pays the price for his ungrateful actions, and is defeated and taken away from the life of a farmer.
prompt: Image of the farmer standing over the snake, which now looks lifeless. The farmer holds a tool for defense. Overcome with emotion and regret.

title: The Aftermath
caption: Although he survived the serpent's deadly bite, the farmer now lives with the reality of Evil and learns to move on with the experience.
prompt: A scene of a person walking in field away from home. He is walking with a hurt hand. Scene should convey, the story has an impact on his life. Warm, inviting lighting with strong shadows from the light.

title: A Universal Truth
caption: This tale teaches a profound truth: not all who are helped will reciprocate with kindness. The world will give you a cruel reality.
prompt: An abstract image representing the duality of human nature. Use contrasting colors and shapes to symbolize good and evil, kindness and betrayal. Avoid literal representations. Focus on creating a visually compelling and thought-provoking image.

title: The Enduring Question
caption: Will he continue to show kindness even after such betrayal? The choice is up to him.
prompt: Close-up of the farmer's face. His expression is thoughtful and resolute. He looks towards the horizon, suggesting hope for the future. Soft, natural lighting. Emphasize the determination in his eyes.

title: Moral of the Story
caption: The lesson: act with compassion, but be aware that goodness is not always returned. Discern wisely.
prompt: A wise old tree standing tall in a field. The roots are deep. Scene should convey the moral of the story, be aware of surroundings. The lesson of acting with compassion but being wise.
